p: Free amino acid concentrations in mature grains were lower in HOSUT compared with Certo and were diminished due to elevated CO 2. The amino acids concerned were asparagine, aspartate, glutamine, and glycine. High N fertilization and growth under the heat wave increased several amino acids in the grains ( Table 3; Supplementary Table S2B). However, again combined effects of reduced grain weight and lower starch concentration could be causal for the response to the heat wave.
